entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (tatooine_eisley_purvis.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_132: The mayor wants to tell you what a good job you're doing. Not that he'd ever say that to me...
entries.s_136: Don't forget, you're still on assignment.
entries.s_197: Recon's exciting, isn't it? No, I guess it's not. So let's get down to something exciting. Combat. Are you ready to battle for Mos Eisley?
entries.s_203: I guess I'm ready for combat.
entries.s_205: We need to do something about your attitude, soldier. I need to hear a 'Yes Sir!'
entries.s_211: No! Put some heart into it. I know you've got more than that. Now give it to me! Let me hear a 'Yes, sir!'
entries.s_216: Oh, come on. Just for me?
entries.s_221: There's not much point in my being a superior officer if I can't get a 'yes, sir' every once in a while is there?
entries.s_227: You're doing it now just to be mean. I mean why else would you stand here arguing with me. You could have just said it and been on your way by now.
entries.s_229: You think I'm just being mean?
entries.s_232: Is that what it is? Are you just mean? I mean, seriously, how hard is it to just give me a 'yes, sir!' every once in a while?
entries.s_240: What is there to think about? You'll either do it or you won't. I'm just saying I don't think it's too much to ask...
entries.s_252: Don't fool yourself, we are at war. The Tusken Raiders are ready to take this city, and I won't let that happen. I won't let you let that happen either.
entries.s_256: What is it you want me to do?
entries.s_258: The Tuskens are sneaky. They're living in that junk town just outside the city. I'm going to have you go out there and do some recon.
entries.s_262: Good attitude, soldier. I'm giving you a location to scout out, when you're done there I'll give you another one. You ready for this?
entries.s_266: Good, good. Here's the location. Prepare your report when you arrive and I'll make contact with you when you're done.
entries.s_268: I think I'm busy right now.
entries.s_270: This war won't end because you're ignoring it. You come back to me when you're ready to do your duty to Mos Eisley.
entries.s_272: Can you explain a little more?
entries.s_274: I want to know what they're up to. I want you to go scout out their little town and see what it is they're planning.
entries.s_44: You have me confused with someone else.
entries.s_46: Oh. My mistake then. I've gotta stop doing that.
entries.s_58: You did good work, soldier, but now it's time for you to move on.
entries.s_66: What are you doing here? You should be out in the field, reconning those Tuskens!
entries.s_68: Good! Very good, indeed! Now, let's get you started. Here are your orders, now get out to the field.
entries.s_70: Still dealing with those Tuskens, eh? Ok, well, get back out there. This isn't break time.
